answers.answer: I'm getting induced Monday at 39 weeks because I have gestational diabetes.
Oh okay & I hope Everything works out!!  Congrats!
Every doctor is different.  Some induce anytime after 39 weeks. Mine is because of back labor at 39+1
It just depends on the doctor and reason.. sometimes people HAVE to be induced for medical reasons other times doctors will induce you  if youre 39+.. mine wont unless im 41 weeks or more

With my first I was 41 weeks when I had her and induction was scheduled but I went into labor and this time they will do elective induction at 39 weeks if cervix ifs favorable meaning dialated some or ephasing

question: So my doctor told me he will only induce me if I go over my due date. Why are other women getting induced at 39 or 38 weeks???
title: Inducing???
